Rescue the Druid Halsin

Still, on a quest to find a cure and remove the mind flayer parasite living within your mind, you will go on a search-and-rescue for a Druid named Halsin who has been taken by the goblins. This quest first begins as you infiltrate the Goblin Camp and eventually find your way into Shattered Sanctum, a guarded area within the camp.
